content.prompt: The final two lines of the poem do which of the following?

choices.label: They answer a question that is explicitly posed in the poem.
They mark an unexpected shift in the poemâ€™s argument.
They summarize the dilemma outlined in lines 1-8.
They reiterate the plea in lines 9-12 more succinctly.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
